name: Agaric Affair
description:
Overview

This is a metroidvania game made in one month for Metroidvania Month 18.

Wake up to see the world.

Explore different zones.

Find new mutations and upgrades.

Defeat the runebearers Trice, Quincy and Varden to get to the final lair.

Defeat Kujin.

See your final form.

Get three different endings based on how many optional upgrades you have.

Controls and gameplay

Move with arrow keys and change the screen mode with F1, everything else is told in the game when needed. There is no in-game map and the game is only saved at specific save points and when you move from one zone to anothe. Saving as often as possible is recommended, the journey is not easy.
